title: aoluain
author: aoluain
created_time: July 02, 2023, 03:57:57 PMLast edit: July 06, 2023, 06:18:08 AM by aoluain
content: I am auctioning 3 of my Diario El Salvador NewspapersAll are in perfect condition [Bitcoin City copy looks creased but its the clear envelope it sits in]All have been kept sealed from UV light with acid free black 160sm card so there has been little or no discolouration of the newsprint paper.LOT 1 - Bitcoin Tendra Validez LegalLOT 2 - Bitcoin DayLOT 3 - Bitcoin City   STARTING BID: 0.0008MINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0002BTC>>Bids limited to 4 decimal places please<<END TIME: Thursday July 6st, 2023, 19:00 GMTSniping: Any bid made PER LOT in the last 5 minutes will extend the auction of each lot by an extra 5 minutes beyond the ending time.Payment: Bitcoin BTC  Postage: By Registered mail only and will be paid by the winning bidder BIDDERS ACCOUNTS MUST BE REGISTERED BEFORE MARCH 1ST 2023

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: Apologies for that, I learned something new today, I assumed in was in GMT but because of daylight saving I'm actually 1 hour ahead. I'll know for next time.
